text: Rodney Desborough Slater (born on the 8th of November 1941) is an English comedic musician. He is best known for being a member of The Bonzo Dog Doo-Dah Band. He and Vivian Stanshall formed, what would become, the Bonzo Dog Doo-Dah Band on the 25th of September 1962 in Slater's house. Slater released his first solo album in 2017, titled Parrotopia! Category:1941 births Category:Living people Category:English musicians Category:British saxophonists
title: Rodney Slater (musician)
